title: The Dallas Cowboys’ Expectations, Plus: What Will 2020 NFL Game Days Look Like? | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Ringer’s Kevin Clark is joined by Bryan Curtis and The Athletic’s Bob Sturm to discuss everything Dallas Cowboys (2:32) and how 2020 NFL broadcasts will be different (41:15).

Host: Kevin Clark

Guest: Bryan Curtis and Bob Sturm
